description: The Crocodile is a fierce opponent. He is not the fastest - but once he's set up, there's little to impress him. Both in offense as well as defense he relies mostly on simple force. Yet beware, he might still surprise those who act carelessly and dare to get too close to him...
plead: This cannot be! I am not... ready...
nervous_1: Leave me alone! You do not want me for an enemy!
nervous_2: It is getting dangerous here... maybe it is time to go.
victory_4: Another castle falls! More plunder for me!
